name: StickyLife
tag_list: custom-stickers, personalized-license-plates, vinyl-window-decals, license-plates, dog-tags, custom-magnets, car-magnets, auto-magnets, temporary-tattoos, temp-tats, yard-signs, banners, vinyl-banners, vinyl-monograms, custom-monograms, monogram, buttons
overview:
StickyLife.com caters to people who love self expression, enjoy the freedom of speech and are not afraid to say what is on their minds. They specialize in small quantity orders of custom products, made by people like you through www.stickylife.com. Some of their products include license plates, custom stickers, pin backed buttons, yard signs, etc. No order is too small and no order is out of question. They do however, adhere to all copyright laws and wonâ€™t make something that would violate them.

Sticky Life visitors create their own custom stickers, car magnets, license plates, static clings, dog tags, keychains, etc. for free without having to start up a new online account or membership or be obligated to buy their creation.

Currently they have 14 different unique products ready for people to personalize. Visitors to StickyLife.com should consider their custom products as a canvas for their words, pictures and graphics. In the end, itâ€™s your imagination that will hold you back.

All of the customizable products found on StickyLife.com make great personalized gifts. Guests to their site can save their work for further editing, reordering, or sharing with others like a friend, colleague, family member or client. This feature also makes it easy to share your personalized gift idea with others.

Their vinyl lettering and other custom vinyl products can withstand 5 to 7 years of exterior use. Vinyl lettering has many different uses like wall art, monograms and custom signs.

StickyLife is on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and Myspace. They use their Facebook page as a way to share images of orders created by other customers. They never share personal information about the customer and protect the customerâ€™s identity at all costs.
